column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The soup broth is thick and flavorful
column4: but the noodle is thicker and chewy compare to other Raman places we been
column5: it may be good for people who like thick noodles
column6: but not for me.... The restaurant inside is dark and modern looking
column7: but kind of hard to see anything
column8: I would prefer to seat outside
